title: World's most popular cruise ships - 2015 [Photos]
text:
Wednesday, July 08, 2015 06:00 AM MDT World's most popular cruise ships - 2015 Previous Next 
Whether you're planning a summer cruise or just looking to book your winter cruise getaway now, make sure you're sailing on the very best cruise ships. New data from CruiseCompete.com , the online cruise marketplace and booking site, has revealed the most popular cruise ships at both the contemporary and premium levels. Rankings are based on the reviews of thousands of cruisers, based on amenities, service and dining. (Fotolia) 
Premium Rankings: 1. Disney Fantasy, Disney Cruise Line. (Jamie McCarthy/Getty Images/AFP) 
2. Celebrity Reflection, Celebrity Cruises. (AFP PHOTO / INGO WAGNER) 
3. Disney Wonder, Disney Cruise Line. (REUTERS/Mike Blake) 
4. Zaandam, Holland America Line. (Jim Fox/Special to Postmedia Network) 
5. Disney Dream, Disney Cruise Line. (Courtesy Disney Cruise Line) 
6. Celebrity Eclipse, Celebrity Cruises. (Courtesy Celebrity Cruises) 
7. Star Princess, Princess Cruises. (REUTERS/Joel Estay) 
Upscale Contemporary Rankings: 1. Norwegian Getaway, Norwegian Cruise Line. 
2. Allure of the Seas, Royal Caribbean International. (MICHEL DESBIENS/Postmedia Network) 
3. Liberty of the Seas, Royal Caribbean International. (Courtesy Royal Caribbean International) 
4. Oasis of the Seas, Royal Caribbean International. (MICHEL DESBIENS/Postmedia Network) 
5. Norwegian Sky, Norwegian Cruise Line. (Fotolia) 
6. Majesty of the Seas, Royal Caribbean International. (AFP PHOTO/Karen BLEIER) 
7. Norwegian Epic, Norwegian Cruise Line. (Courtesy Norwegian Cruise Line)
